description: PHI creation requires documentation and access control compliance
PHI receipt requires verification and logging compliance
PHI storage requires encryption and backup compliance
PHI access requires authorization and audit logging compliance
PHI modification requires integrity controls and documentation compliance
PHI disclosure requires authorization and accounting compliance
PHI transmission requires encryption and secure channel compliance
PHI backup requires testing and recovery procedures compliance
PHI archival requires retention schedule and access controls compliance
PHI audit logging requires system monitoring and review compliance
PHI de-identification requires safe harbor or expert determination compliance
PHI destruction requires secure disposal and certification compliance
